There was an error initializing the YouTubePlayer (%1$s)
Improve your daily engagement score up by interacting with the daily good day/bad icons. See what type of day your team had and what your engagement score is like compared to others. You can always improve by completing Surveys.
Click on the individual risk to see the actions and responsible owner. You can also type comments in this to add to any risks you have been assigned actions for This opens up your organisation risk register. From here you can look at the Organisations risk via strengths, weaknesses, opportunities and threats or all by selecting SWOT Click on this icon to open the risk module Welcome to the Tribe365 app. Now you are logged in let"'"s go through a few features on the app Click here to see a short video on your organisation"'"s vision Press each Belief value and score your understanding using the sliding scales Now you have seen the Organisational vision, click here to score yourself against the values The bell icon is where you find all alerts/interaction from the Tribe team. You can also archive and view archived notifications and interactions here. When you first login, this is where all your culture surveys for completion are listed This is your profile. Here, you can check whether your contact details are correct, change passwords and look at your individual Culture profile Award Kudos to your colleagues by selecting the relevant observed behaviour and selecting the colleague from the dropdown menu. Then hit send! Amazing Award to your colleagues by giving relevant messages and selecting the colleagues from the dropdown menu. Then hit send! Improve your daily engagement score up by interacting with the daily good day/bad icons. See what type of day your team had and what your engagement score is like compared to others. You can always improve by completing Kudos & Surveys.
You can report anything here in the free text box. Give it a try now and Dan or Holly Will get back to you. Remember that we want to hear about anything you think the organisation needs to hear
Pressing your organisation logo will take you back to the home screen. Ok. Thanks for letting us show you around. Please explore the app yourself and let us know any feedback \n Happy Tribeing.

Home Know company Know Members Offloading Risk Support App Tour Logout Individuals Know Tell Us """Amazing""" Award Registering Organisations should use Tribe365 to get actionable data around the people in the organisation. Organisations can range from 1 – 10,000 staff By using Tribe365, staff will be able to interact 24/7 with the companies beliefs, values, vision, mission and focus and understand what it really means to be part of you Tribe every second of every day.
